questions.question: How do I reset my CCMS password?

steps.text: Please contact your Clinic system administrator (MOIC/PPP/FMS)
Admin will give you a new temporary pasword
Log in using the temporary password and change to the new desired password
Accounts are automatically locked after 3-5 failed login attempts for security purposes. System Admin will be able to unlock your account.

questions.question: How do I search for a patient record?

steps.text:
You can search for patient records using:
• IC Number (most accurate)
• Patient ID/MRN
• Name (surname first, then given name)
• Contact number
Navigate to the 'Patient Search' module and enter at least one search criterion
Click 'Search'. Results will display matching records. Click on a record to view full details.
Ensure you have appropriate access permissions for the department.

questions.question: What do I do if patient information is incorrect?

steps.text: Do NOT modify demographic data directly
Contact the Registration Department at ext. 3200
Submit a 'Patient Data Amendment Form' (Form CCMS-001)
Provide supporting documentation (IC copy, proof of address, etc.)
Amendments are typically processed within 2 working days. For clinical data corrections, follow your department's clinical documentation amendment protocol.

questions.question: How to print the same content duplicated side-by-side on one physical page (e.g., two identical halves on A4), using LibreOffice Write

steps.text: Buka consultation yang anda nak print.
Tekan Print.
Dalam ruangan Pages, taip: 1, 1  (Ini bermaksud: Print halaman 1 dua kali)
Di bahagian Pages per Sheet, pilih 2 pages per sheet.
Pastikan susunan (Order) adalah Left → Right dan Page Layout dalam keadaan Landscape
Tekan Print.

Hasilnya: Satu kertas A4 akan ada dua salinan consultation yang sama, diletakkan side-by-side. Ketatapan ini adalah sesuai untuk digunakan bagi kegunaan Maternal and Child Health Clinic di mana ia memerlukan dua salinan fizikal
